description: Create a transport order efficiency summary.
permissions: Requires an authenticated (persisted) user. Results are scoped to transport orders the user is authorized to access unless the user is an admin.
validation_notes: --filters must be a valid JSON object; --filter entries must be in key=value form with a non-empty key. When both are provided, key=value pairs override any duplicate keys from --filters. group-by defaults to customer when not set. If no metric/metrics are provided and --all-metrics is not set, the default metrics are transport_order_count, ordered_miles_sum, routed_miles_sum, deviated_miles_sum. Date filters ordered_date, ordered_date_min, ordered_date_max, pickup_date, pickup_date_min, pickup_date_max require YYYY-MM-DD; is_managed and was_unmanaged accept true/false. Filters broker, customer, project_division, project_office, project_category, driver, transport_order expect integer IDs. transport_order_status must be a valid transport_order_status enum value.

flags.name: --group-by
flags.description: Group by attributes (comma-separated). Defaults to customer unless set.
flags.validation: Comma-separated list. Supported values: broker, customer, driver, is_managed, ordered_date, pickup_date, project_category, project_division, project_office, transport_order, transport_order_status, was_unmanaged.

flags.name: --all-metrics
flags.description: Include all metrics returned by the API

flags.name: --metric
flags.validation: Repeatable. Supported values: transport_order_count, ordered_minutes_sum, ordered_minutes_avg, ordered_miles_sum, ordered_miles_avg, routed_minutes_sum, routed_minutes_avg, routed_miles_sum, routed_miles_avg, deviated_minutes_sum, deviated_minutes_avg, deviated_miles_sum, deviated_miles_avg, routed_minutes_over_ordered_pct, routed_miles_over_ordered_pct, deviated_minutes_over_routed_pct, deviated_miles_over_routed_pct, routed_minutes_minus_ordered, routed_miles_minus_ordered, deviated_minutes_minus_routed, deviated_miles_minus_routed, project_transport_plan_driver_count, project_transport_plan_driver_confirmation_count.

flags.name: --metrics
flags.validation: Comma-separated list. Supported values: transport_order_count, ordered_minutes_sum, ordered_minutes_avg, ordered_miles_sum, ordered_miles_avg, routed_minutes_sum, routed_minutes_avg, routed_miles_sum, routed_miles_avg, deviated_minutes_sum, deviated_minutes_avg, deviated_miles_sum, deviated_miles_avg, routed_minutes_over_ordered_pct, routed_miles_over_ordered_pct, deviated_minutes_over_routed_pct, deviated_miles_over_routed_pct, routed_minutes_minus_ordered, routed_miles_minus_ordered, deviated_minutes_minus_routed, deviated_miles_minus_routed, project_transport_plan_driver_count, project_transport_plan_driver_confirmation_count.

flags.name: --filter
flags.validation: Must be key=value with a non-empty key. Supported keys: broker, customer, driver, is_managed, was_unmanaged, ordered_date, ordered_date_min, ordered_date_max, pickup_date, pickup_date_min, pickup_date_max, project_division, project_office, project_category, transport_order, transport_order_status.

flags.name: --filters
flags.validation: Must be a JSON object. Supported keys: broker, customer, driver, is_managed, was_unmanaged, ordered_date, ordered_date_min, ordered_date_max, pickup_date, pickup_date_min, pickup_date_max, project_division, project_office, project_category, transport_order, transport_order_status.
